text: Hagi ana zanke hu'za afete'are'ma nemaniza Isaka naga'ma, Zebuluni nagama, Naptali naga'mo'za donki agumpima, kemoli agumpima, hosi agumpima bulimakao agumpima witima, fikima, ante hagagehu krepima, wainima hu'za erinte'za eri'za ne-eza bulimakao afu'ene sipisipi afu'ene avre'za e'naze. Na'ankure maka Israeli mopafina vahe'mo'za tusi muse hu'naze.
